[[File:USS Chicago (SSN 721) with bulls logo undocking.jpg|thumb|175px|Bulls logo upon the bow of the [[USS Chicago (SSN-721)|USS Chicago]].]]
[[File:USS Chicago (SSN 721) with bulls logo undocking.jpg|thumb|175px|Bulls logo upon the bow of the [[USS Chicago (SSN-721)|USS Chicago]].]]
The iconic Bulls' logo is a red bull's face with an angry expression. The horns are tipped with blood. The logo was designed by noted American sports artist [[Theodore W. Drake]] and was adopted in 1966. At one point, the Bulls also had an alternate logo during the early 70s, featuring the same Bulls logo, but with a cloud that says "Windy City" below the bull's nose.
